scripts.docs:deploy:windows: yarn docs:build && cd docs\.vuepress\dist && git init && git add -A &&  git commit -m "deploy" && git push -f https://github.com/phpwintools/wmi-scripting.git master:gh-pages
scripts.docs:deploy:windows:ci: yarn docs:build && cd docs\.vuepress\dist && git init && git add -A &&  git commit -m "deploy" && git push -f git@github.com:phpwintools/wmi-scripting.git master:gh-pages
scripts.docs:deploy:linux: yarn docs:build && cd docs/.vuepress/dist && git init &&  git add -A && git commit -m "deploy" && git push -f https://github.com/phpwintools/wmi-scripting.git master:gh-pages
